title: Meet Anthony Hogg: Senior Enterprise Architect and Lifelong Learner
description: At Akamai and across the tech industry at large, best practices and tools are constantly evolving. To keep up with these changes, a passion for learning is key, especially among those who support and enable others. One Senior Enterprise Architect on Akamai?s Advanced Solutions team, Anthony Hogg, truly embodies this value.
author: Chuck Freedman
